item.title: Visualizing Movie Dialog with ggplot2
item.description: Some intro text. #ideas: length of dialogue, look at specific movies, compare men and women in older and newer movies library(ggplot2) library(stringr) theme_set(theme_bw()) characters <- read.delim("~/Documents/website/movie-dialog/movie-dialog-corpus/movie_characters_metadata.tsv",header=FALSE) names(characters) <- c("charID","charName","movID","movTitle","gender","creditPosition") char_complete <- subset(characters,gender !="?" & creditPosition != "?") char_complete$movID <- as.character(char_complete$movID) lines <- read.delim("~/Documents/website/movie-dialog/movie-dialog-corpus/movie_lines.tsv",header=FALSE) names(lines) <- c("lineID","charID","movID","charName","lineText") movies <- read.delim("~/Documents/website/movie-dialog/movie-dialog-corpus/movie_titles_metadata.tsv",header=FALSE) names(movies) <- c("movID","movTitle","movYear","movRating","movVotes","movGenres") movies$movYear <- as.numeric(as.character(movies$movYear)) ## Warning: NAs introduced by coercion movies$movID <- as.character(movies$movID) movies$movGenres <- as.character(movies$movGenres) movies$movGenres <- str_replace(movies$movGenres,"\\[","") movies$movGenres <- str_replace(movies$movGenres,"\\]","") movies$movPrimGenre <- sapply(strsplit(movies$movGenres," "),`[`,1) movies$movPrimGenre <- str_replace_all(movies$movPrimGenre,"\\'","") #movies by year g <- ggplot(movies,aes(x=movYear)) + geom_histogram(stat="bin",binwidth = 5) + labs(x="Year",y="Number of Movies") g ## Warning: Removed 17 rows containing non-finite values (stat_bin).
